attributes.action: accurately report weekly  figures informing the public of service personnel that have been injured, or have become incapacitated,limbless or blind  due to service in Afghanistan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Inform the public accurately the numbers of our troops who are wounded weekly. The public have the right to know how many of our brave lads and lasses have become limbless, blind , paralysed/incapacitated, or injured in any way which calls for them to be taken out of operational theatre.  These troops deserve to be recognised in their own right and not hidden away.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "accurately report weekly figures informing the public of service personnel that have been injured, or have become incapacitated,limbless or blind due to service in Afghanistan."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22163
